meanings.definition: Errors in typing or printing, especially ones caused by striking the wrong key on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: I made several typos in my essay and had to correct them.
meanings.sent2: The book had a few typos that needed to be fixed before publishing.
meanings.sent3: My typos were so silly that they made my friend laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her typos were like little gremlins messing up her document.
meanings.sent5: The typos on the sign made it hard to read and understand.

meanings.definition: Mistakes in written or printed text, typically resulting from carelessness or haste.
meanings.sent1: The teacher noticed the typos in my homework and asked me to correct them.
meanings.sent2: She was embarrassed by the typos in her email to the boss.
meanings.sent3: The typos in the menu made the prices look like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: His typos were like little landmines waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The typos in the report changed the meaning of the entire paragraph.
